thread.title: Adomah returns to action for Middlesbrough despite concerns over his fitness
thread.title_full: Adomah returns to action for Middlesbrough despite concerns over his fitness

title: Adomah returns to action for Middlesbrough despite concerns over his fitness
text:
13:40 CET Adomah returns to action for Middlesbrough despite concerns over his fitness - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Ghana winger Albert Adomah returned to action for Middlesbrough on Saturday despite concerns over his fitness and mental state for their tough match against Fulham. 
The Black Stars was in action during the English Championship match as they were held to goalless draw by the Cottagers in the crucial match. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
